reviews.review_msg: Just a really disorganized prof, although a sweet person. Spare yourself the stress and don't take her class.

Kind and warmhearted instructor. But so disorganized. Kept changing the syllabus during the semester, cancelled class multiple times with little to no notice. You can tell she's unprepared all the time. Takes a week to reply to emails so she's impossible to reach outside of class, bad for our 3 day take home final that she posted half a day late.
